answers.answer: Don't freak.  Nothing is sure until it's sure.  Chinese always affects my BGL too so it might have been lunch.  Have the dr test away till he's happy but still don't freak.  There are worse things in life than diabetes.

question: I just had a doctors appointment right after eating lunch(chinese). I am not diagnosed with diabetes but my blood suger came out to 157 and she said that I had protein in my urine.  I am having more tests done tomorrow, but could the fact that I had just ate lunch be the cause of the readings in both my blood and urine.  I am a really nervous person so I am freaking outf!
title: I need a quick answer
